content: get ready to brighten up your home with this beautiful fall crochet wreath a fast and fun crochet project full of flowers and pumpkins in autumn colors bring your crochet love right to your front door this fun fall pattern includes written instructions and photos for the embellishments for a purchased grapevine wreath it is an advanced beginner/intermediate level crochet pattern written in english using standard american terms note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own flowers and pumpkins and assemble it all together for a fun fall wreath > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern yarn weight and gauge does not need to be exact just adjust hook size for your chosen yarn wreath is approximately 18 across at widest point materials needed - worsted weight yarn - crochet hook sizes g & h - 18 grapevine wreath - buttons if desired - fiberfill - floral wire - tapestry needle pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/fabulous-fall-crochet-wreath/
